properties.name: experimentsFileUploadLocation
properties.description: The path for storing experiment files uploaded by the user.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.ram
properties.description: The default value for the RAM if nothing is set.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.cpu
properties.description: The default value for the CPU if nothing is set.

properties.name: kubernetes.deployment.defaults.bookedTime
properties.description: The default value for the booked time if nothing is set.

properties.name: mockdata
properties.description: Populates the database with demo data for development purposes.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret used for signing JWTs.

properties.name: mockKubernetesClient
properties.description: Set false if you want to use the KubernetesClient.

properties.name: kubernetes.defaultLogLines
properties.description: Default amount of lines returned when requesting the logs of an active execution without specifying the amount of lines explicitly.

properties.name: kubernetes.debugging
properties.description: Set debugging to false in order to use the kubernetes pod informer. If debugging is set to true, kubernetes will throw an exception that it cannot use the pod informer.

properties.name: kubernetes.excludedNamespaces
properties.description: The list of namespaces in String representation that are going to be excluded from the kubernetes pod informer update method.

properties.name: reporting-service-uri
properties.description: URI for the ReportingService.

properties.name: dockerHubRepoPath
properties.description: The repository name for the hafenkran docker-hub.

properties.name: dockerClient.username
properties.description: The username of the local docker client.

properties.name: dockerClient.password
properties.description: The password of the local docker client.

properties.name: dockerClient.email
properties.description: The email-address of the local docker client.

properties.name: dockerClient.authKey
properties.description: The authentication key of the local docker client.

properties.name: dockerClient.certPath
properties.description: The path to the local docker client's certifications.

properties.name: dockerClient.configPath
properties.description: The path to the local docker client's config file.

properties.name: dockerClient.tls
properties.description: Enable TLS for the local docker client. Set to 1 to activate. Set to 0 to deactivate. Needs a correct certPath to use TLS.

properties.name: dockerClient.host
properties.description: The path to the local docker daemon. Can be a tcp, unix or fd socket.

properties.name: service-user.name
properties.description: Name of the user used for internal communication between services.

properties.name: service-user.password
properties.description: Password of the user used for internal communication between services.

properties.name: service-user.secret
properties.description: The secret used for validating that the requesting side is actually an internal service.

properties.name: user-service-uri
properties.description: URI for the UserService.

properties.name: kubernetes.pod-cleanup-scheduler-delay
properties.description: Delay in seconds between scheduler runs for cleanup of executions which exceed their booked time limit.

properties.name: kubernetes.config.load-default
properties.description: Loads the default config located in the users home directory (especially useful for minikube installations).

properties.name: kubernetes.config.location
properties.description: The config location if the load-default is not used.
